dental-benefits.title: {{titleComponent}}: accès à d'autres prestations dentaires fédérales, provinciales ou territoriales
dental-benefits.access-to-dental: (FR) Access to dental coverage through a provincial, territorial or federal government social program will not impact the child's eligibility for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
dental-benefits.eligibility-criteria: (FR) If the child meets all the eligibility criteria, their coverage will be coordinated between the plans to ensure there are no gaps or duplication in coverage.

federal-benefits.title: Prestations fédérales
federal-benefits.legend: (FR) Does {{childName}} have dental benefits through a social program offered by a federal program?
federal-benefits.option-no: (FR) No, this child does not have federal dental benefits.

social-programs.legend: (FR) Please select which social program the child is covered under. If the child has more than one, please select the one they use most.

provincial-territorial-benefits.title: Assurances provinciales ou territoriales
provincial-territorial-benefits.legend: (FR) Does {{childName}} this child have dental benefits through a social program offered by your province or territory?
provincial-territorial-benefits.option-yes: (FR) Yes, this child has provincial or territorial dental benefits.
provincial-territorial-benefits.option-no: (FR) No, this child does not have provincial or territorial dental benefits.

social-programs.input-legend: Si oui, par l'entremise de quelle province ou de quel territoire?
social-programs.radio-legend: (FR) Please select which social program the child is covered under. If the child has more than one, please select the one they use most.

error-message.federal-benefit-required: (FR) Select whether your child has a federal dental benefits
error-message.provincial-benefit-required: (FR) Select whether your child has provincial or territorial dental benefits
